caption.title: How daily increment in the daily imported number of livestock impacts patterns of disease outbreaks.
caption.p:
(a)-(c) and (d)-(f) show the populations of infectious livestock and vectors in patches 1â€“3, respectively. The increment
on the daily imported number in patch 1 are 20, 100 and180 per day, represented by solid, dashed and dotted lines, respectively. Values of other parameters are identical with those used in Fig. 3 and
(km per day).
